predefinedIcons.title: Predefined Icons
predefinedIcons.description: A list of predefined icons available for the project.

loaderFile.title: Loader File
loaderFile.description: The loader assembly file of the project (usually named "Loader.S").

outputFile.title: Output File
outputFile.description: The output file of the loader (usually named "Loader.bin").

QLabel.title: Kamek
QLabel.resources: Don't know how to setup Kamek ? Check out the %s for more information.

kamekFile.title: Kamek File
kamekFile.description: The file containing the list of patches of the project (usually named "NewerProject.yaml").

buildFolder.title: Kamek Build Folder
buildFolder.description:
The folder where the project will be built (usually named "Build").
WARNING: This folder will be deleted before each compilation !

outputFolder.title: Kamek Output Folder
outputFolder.description: The folder where the project will be moved after each compilation (usually named "NewerRes").

generatePAL.title: Generate PAL Version
generatePAL.description: Determines whether the European version (EU) of the project will be generated.

generateNTSC.title: Generate NTSC Version
generateNTSC.description: Determines whether the American version (US) of the project will be generated.

generateJP.title: Generate JP Version
generateJP.description: Determines whether the Japanese version (JP) of the project will be generated.

generateTW.title: Generate TW Version
generateTW.description: Determines whether the Taiwanese version (TW) of the project will be generated.

generateKR.title: Generate KR Version
generateKR.description: Determines whether the Korean version (KR) of the project will be generated.

reggieNextFolder.title: Reggie Next Folder
reggieNextFolder.description: The Reggie Next patch folder of the project, which contains the patch files (like "spritedata.xml", "sprites.py", etc.).

openReggieNextFolder.title: Reggie Next Folder
openReggieNextFolder.dialog: Sparkamek > Open Project > Reggie Next Folder

editReggieNextFolder.title: Reggie Next Folder
editReggieNextFolder.dialog: Sparkamek > Edit Project > Reggie Next Folder

riivolutionFile.title: Riivolution File
riivolutionFile.description: The Riivolution XML file of the project (usually named "NewerSMBW.xml").
